[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@here/harp-features-datasource](./harp-features-datasource.md) &gt; [FeaturesDataSource](./harp-features-datasource.featuresdatasource.md)

## FeaturesDataSource class

\[\[DataSource\]\] implementation to use for the addition of custom features.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class FeaturesDataSource extends OmvDataSource 
```

## Constructors

|  Constructor | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [(constructor)(options)](./harp-features-datasource.featuresdatasource._constructor_.md) |  | Builds a <code>FeaturesDataSource</code>. |

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [add(features)](./harp-features-datasource.featuresdatasource.add.md) |  | Adds a custom feature in the datasource. |
|  [attach(mapView)](./harp-features-datasource.featuresdatasource.attach.md) |  | Override \[\[DataSource.attach\]\] to know if we're really connected to \[\[MapView\]\]. |
|  [clear()](./harp-features-datasource.featuresdatasource.clear.md) |  | Removes all the custom features in this <code>FeaturesDataSource</code>. |
|  [connect()](./harp-features-datasource.featuresdatasource.connect.md) |  |  |
|  [detach(mapView)](./harp-features-datasource.featuresdatasource.detach.md) |  | Override \[\[DataSource.detach\]\] to know if we're really connected to \[\[MapView\]\]. |
|  [getGeoBox()](./harp-features-datasource.featuresdatasource.getgeobox.md) |  | Get \[\[GeoBox\]\] containing all the points in datasource.<!-- -->Returns undefined if there were no features added to this DS. |
|  [remove(features)](./harp-features-datasource.featuresdatasource.remove.md) |  | Removes a custom feature in the datasource. |
|  [setFromGeojson(geojson)](./harp-features-datasource.featuresdatasource.setfromgeojson.md) |  | This method allows to directly add a GeoJSON without using \[\[MapViewFeature\]\] instances. It also overwrites existing features in this data source. To add a GeoJSON without overwriting the data source, one should loop through it to create \[\[MapViewFeature\]\] and add them with the <code>add</code> method. |
